name: 3D Frog Frenzy Free
description: Retro arcade action.... Best selling &quot;3D Frog Frenzy&quot; is now on the iPhone and Ipad! This special FREE edition features 5 full levels. Frog hoppin' fun! Froggy is trying to escape the city... but he can't swim. He really needs your help. Guide our little frog friend through treacherous traffic and across ravenging rivers. Grab power-ups along the way to make the journey easier. Incredible all new 3D graphics, cool music and non-stop arcade action! Features: * 5 hoppin' fun levels * Cool power-ups * High-score table * Addicting game-play * Super cool soundtrack * Classic retro fun Compatibility: * iPhone * iPod Touch * iPad
